name: Harpie's Kaleidoscope (Skill Card)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect:
"Harpie Lady Sisters" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Monster or Trap effects, also they gain the following effect:
● Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can place 2 WIND Winged Beast monsters from your GY on the bottom of the Deck in any order, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; return it to the hand.
